lead_paragraph: Readers disagree on whether Dzhokhar Tsarnaev should have been sentenced to death for his part in the marathon bombing.

headline.main: Death Penalty for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev in the Boston Marathon Bombing
headline.print_headline: Death Penalty in the Boston Bombing

snippet: Readers disagree on whether Dzhokhar Tsarnaev should have been sentenced to death for his part in the marathon bombing.
